title: How to Make Almond Cream

steps.headline: Pour one cup of purified water into the blender.
Add 1-2 tablespoon of the sweetener of your choice.
Add half cup of ground blanched almonds.

text: Pour one cup of purified water into the blender.  Add 1-2 tablespoon of the sweetener of your choice.  Add half cup of ground blanched almonds.  Blend all the ingredients well.  Finished.
